before.name: archive
before.comment: Archive area for deleted pages and their revisions. These may be viewed (and restored) by admins through the Special:Undelete interface.

columns.name: ar_deleted
columns.comment: Copied from rev_deleted. Although this may be raised during deletion. Users with the "suppressrevision" right may "archive" and "suppress" content in a single action. @since 1.10

columns.name: ar_len
columns.comment: Copied from rev_len, length of this revision in bytes. @since 1.10

columns.name: ar_page_id
columns.comment: Copied from page_id. Restoration will attempt to use this as page ID if no current page with the same name exists. Otherwise, the revisions will be restored under the current page. Can be used for manual undeletion by developers if multiple pages by the same name were archived. @since 1.11 Older entries will have NULL.

columns.name: ar_sha1
columns.comment: Copied from rev_sha1, SHA-1 text content hash in base-36 @since 1.19

indexes.name: ar_name_title_timestamp
indexes.comment: Index for Special:Undelete to page through deleted revisions

indexes.name: ar_revid_uniq
indexes.comment: Index for linking archive rows with tables that normally link with revision rows, such as change_tag.
